content: <eml:eml xmlns:eml="eml://ecoinformatics.org/eml-2.1.1"          xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"          xsi:schemaLocation="eml://ecoinformatics.org/eml-2.1.1 <alternateIdentifier>14026</alternateIdentifier>   <title>iNaturalist research-grade observations</title> <creator> </creator> <metadataProvider> </metadataProvider> <pubDate>         2015-01-08 </pubDate> <language>ENGLISH</language> <abstract>   <para>Research-grade observations from iNaturalist.org.</para> </abstract>   <intellectualRights>     <para>Owner grants GBIF a worldwide, non-exclusive right to: (i) use,         reproduce, perform, display, archive, transmit and distribute the         Content (including any trademarks, tradenames and logos in the         Content) in electronic form in connection with the Site, (ii) allow         users of the Site to use, search, copy, download and transmit the         Content, and (iii) modify and reformat the Content, but solely to the         extent necessary and for the purposes of: (a) conforming to the format         and "look and feel" of the Site, and (b) creating snippets, headlines         or teasers consisting of selected lines or sections from the Content         to be displayed on the Site (or displayed on other websites owned by         GBIF for the purposes of directing traffic to the Site).</para>   </intellectualRights>   <distribution scope="document">     <online>       <url function="information">http://www.inaturalist.org/observations</url>     </online>   </distribution>   <coverage>       <geographicCoverage>           <geographicDescription>Bounding Box</geographicDescription>         <boundingCoordinates>           <westBoundingCoordinate>-179.987</westBoundingCoordinate>           <eastBoundingCoordinate>179.94</eastBoundingCoordinate>           <northBoundingCoordinate>79.849</northBoundingCoordinate>           <southBoundingCoordinate>-77.893</southBoundingCoordinate>         </boundingCoordinates>       </geographicCoverage>       <temporalCoverage>           <rangeOfDates>             <beginDate>               <calendarDate>        0214-05-31 </calendarDate>             </beginDate>             <endDate>               <calendarDate>        2015-01-08 </calendarDate>             </endDate>           </rangeOfDates>       </temporalCoverage>   </coverage>   <purpose>     <para>iNaturalist.org is a website where anyone can record their         observations from nature. Members record observations for numerous         reasons, including participation in citizen science projects, class         projects, and personal fulfillment.</para>   </purpose>   <methods>       <methodStep>         <description>           <para>Observation recorded and verified by the community</para>         </description>       </methodStep>       <qualityControl>         <description>           <para>iNaturalist observations achieve research grade when 1) the             iNaturalist community agrees with the observer's ID, where an             "agreeing" identification is one that matches exactly or is of a             child taxon of the observer's ID, 2) the observation has a date,             3) the observation is georeferenced, 4) the observation has a             photo.</para>         </description>       </qualityControl>   </methods>  </dataset>  <additionalMetadata>   <metadata>     <gbif>         <dateStamp>2015-01-14T10:10:37.779+01:00</dateStamp>         <citation>iNaturalist.org: iNaturalist research-grade observations</citation>         <resourceLogoUrl>http://www.inaturalist.org/assets/logo-small.gif</resourceLogoUrl>     </gbif>   </metadata> </additionalMetadata>  </eml:eml>
